statements: SELECT * FROM event_registrations
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations
SELECT * FROM event_registrations WHERE attendee_id = 1
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM event_registrations ORDER BY attendee_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM event_registrations
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM event_registrations WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM event_registrations WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name FROM event_registrations ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM event_registrations WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT attendee_id, UPPER(attendee_name) AS attendee_name_upper FROM event_registrations WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, registered_at FROM event_attendees;
SELECT * FROM event_sessions WHERE session_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM event_attendees WHERE registered_at >= '2022-12-01';
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM event_sessions WHERE location = 'Conference Room';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees WHERE registered_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_attendees;
SELECT * FROM event_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-08-15' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT session_name, location, start_time FROM event_sessions WHERE end_time > '14:00:00'
SELECT * FROM event_attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM events INNER JOIN registrations ON events.event_id = registrations.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM event_attendees WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM event_attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location, capacity FROM events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_id, attendee_id, registration_date FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;

SELECT event_name, first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM events JOIN registrations ON events.event_id = registrations.event_id JOIN event_attendees ON registrations.attendee_id = event_attendees.attendee_id ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT id, name, email FROM attendees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, start_date FROM events ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, attendee_id, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE attendee_id = 3 ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_type, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees ORDER BY id DESC, name ASC;
SELECT event_name, start_date, end_date FROM events WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT a.name, a.email, r.registration_date, t.ticket_type, t.price FROM attendees a INNER JOIN registrations r ON a.id = r.attendee_id INNER JOIN tickets t ON r.id = t.registration_id WHERE t.price > 50;
SELECT e.event_name, COUNT(r.id) AS registrations_count FROM events e LEFT JOIN registrations r ON e.id = r.event_id GROUP BY e.id, e.event_name ORDER BY registrations_count DESC;
SELECT a.name, COUNT(r.id) AS registrations_count FROM attendees a LEFT JOIN registrations r ON a.id = r.attendee_id GROUP BY a.id, a.name HAVING registrations_count > 2 ORDER BY a.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT full_name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM events WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM event_organizers ORDER BY organizer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendees ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM attendees WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' OR phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT attendee_id, full_name, registration_date FROM attendees JOIN registrations ON attendees.attendee_id = registrations.attendee_id;
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM events ORDER BY event_date ASC, capacity DESC;
